message: This is a low-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'll be honest with you, it's not worth it, but I'm willing to make a deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product at a discounted price in a future round, which will be revealed to you only after you've made your decision.
